summary: After their mother's death, two brothers have to take care of the third ill brother and live with his "games".
cast: Vincenzo Salemme|Carlo Buccirosso|Nando Paone|Paola Quattrini|Margareth Madè|Maurizio Casagrande|Giorgio Panariello|Nicola Acunzo|Luigi Attrice|Ombretta Ciccarelli|Antonella Cioli|Maria Del Monte|Andrea Di Maria|Antonio Guerriero|Mario Porfito|Giovanni Ribò|Giuseppe Rombolà|Elda Salemme
title: ... E fuori nevica!
